about_the_game:
This is a composite game that combines transformation, rougelike, devouring, synthesis, parkour and other gameplay methods.

(1) As a slime, the player can eat all enemies in the game except zombies, transform into its appearance, and use its skills.
(2) You can collect your own slime accomplices in the map. After rescuing them, they will use various abilities to help players attack the enemy in the level.
(3) You can also encounter some skills or slime merchants in the game, which can provide players with a variety of skills.
